Three people were killed and another was injured in the towns of Machias and Jonesboro. A 63-year-old man has been charged with three counts of murder and one count of attempted murder in the case.[594]

One person was killed and five others were injured from a shooting on a Greyhound bus heading from Los Angeles to San Francisco. The bus was traversing Tejon Pass on Interstate 5, near Lebec, California, and stopped in Grapevine after the shooting.[595]

Police responded to a street location where multiple shots were fired. They found four victims, aged 18–45 years old, with bullet wounds. Three of the victims were transported by helicopter to a hospital. It is unknown what their conditions are. Police are trying to locate any suspects in the shooting.[596]

A shooter shot and killed two members of a family and a friend of one of them inside a house. A third fled through a window uninjured and alerted the authorities. The shooter then committed suicide.[597]

One person was killed and four others were injured in a shooting incident that occurred in several locations. One of the injured is in critical condition while the other three are expected to recover. The shooting happened during a memorial gathering for a victim who previously passed away due to a traffic accident.[598]
A shooting left one victim dead and the other three injured in the 200 block of Northeast First Court.[599]
A shooting occurred at an apartment complex where four teens were injured. All four victims, aged 15–17 years old, suffered non-life-threatening injuries according to first responders.[600]

Four teenagers were injured in a shooting on public streets. Three of the victims are listed in stable condition while the fourth is in critical condition. Police are interviewing witnesses for their investigation.[601]
Four men were wounded outside the Golden Hill Street Courthouse while sitting in a car, in a drive-by shooting by multiple shooters.[602]

Four family members were shot at a home. Three of the victims are dead and the fourth victim, a child, is wounded and is in serious condition. The suspect was apprehended and arrested by the police.[603]
Multiple shots were fired inside a business where five people were wounded in a shooting.[604]
Six people were injured by a shooting shortly after midnight, at a local restaurant. An additional three others were treated for non-gunfire related injuries.[605]
Three people were fatally shot and four others were injured at a bar.[606]
A man shot and killed his wife and three children, aged between eight months and four years old, along with the family dog. He then killed himself.[607]
A woman killed one person and injured two others before killing herself at a cigar lounge. The victims were Illinois State Troopers.[608]
Eight people were shot, one fatally, outside a McDonald's on Pine Street in Downtown Seattle.[609]
Two people (including the perpetrator) were killed and fifteen others were injured during a shooting at a nightclub.[610]
Police discovered two people dead and two injured after responding to a shooting.[611]
One person was killed and four others were injured during a shooting outside a nightclub.[612]
Two people were killed and five others injured at a nightclub.[613]

Haynie family shooting: Four people were killed and one was injured after a teenager allegedly fired at his family at their house. He was charged with four counts of aggravated murder, one count of attempted aggravated murder and five counts of illegal discharge of a firearm.[614]
Three children between 11 and 16 years old were injured along with two adults after two perpetrators fired into a barber shop in the East Garfield Park neighborhood.[615]
Two people were killed and two injured after a shooting in a home's detached garage.[616]
Five people, including three teenagers, were wounded by a 16-year-old shooter at an apartment building.[617]
Two people were killed and two injured in a random ambush style shooting. The perpetrator was arrested after arriving at his mother's house covered in blood.[618]
Four people were injured by a single person after an argument near a northwestern Atlanta nightclub early in the morning.[619]
One man was killed and three men were injured in a mid morning shooting.[620]
Four people were wounded in a drive-by shooting outside an apartment building in the Sunset Park neighborhood.[621]
Responding police discovered three people dead and one wounded at an early morning shooting in the Benton Park neighborhood.[622]
An argument in a Downtown Cleveland night club's VIP section led to three people being wounded and a fourth person was shot in the head in the back alley.[623]
Seven people were wounded inside and out a hookah bar early in the morning, after an argument escalated.[624]
A family of four, including nine-year-old twin boys, were shot and killed at their home after celebrating New Year's Eve. A 16-year-old boy was seriously injured.[625]
